dcterms:creator: A. Lopez
A. O. Caffò
L. Tinella
A. Bosco
dcterms:description: The Four Factors of Mind Wandering Questionnaire (4FMW) assesses four facets of maladaptive mind wandering, focusing on poor attentional control and guilty fear of failure.
dcterms:title: Four Factors Mind Wandering Questionnaire (4FMW)

dcterms:creator: A. Fossati
S. Borroni
F. Del Corno
dcterms:description: The DSM-5 Self-Rated Level 1 Cross-Cutting Symptom Measure assesses various psychological symptoms to aid in the diagnosis of mental disorders.
dcterms:title: DSM-5 Self-Rated Level 1 Cross-Cutting Symptom Measure – Adult

dcterms:creator: G. Migliarese
V. Venturi
G. Cerveri
C. L. Mencacci
dcterms:description: The Ultra-short screening list for ADHD in adults is a brief assessment tool designed to identify symptoms of ADHD in adult populations.
dcterms:title: Ultra-short screening list for ADHD in adults

dcterms:creator: A. Lopez
A. O. Caffò
L. Tinella
M. N. Di Masi
A. Bosco
dcterms:description: This dataset examines variations in mindfulness associated with the COVID-19 outbreak, focusing on cognitive failures, intrusive thoughts, and rumination.
dcterms:title: Variations in mindfulness associated with the COVID‐19 outbreak
